orig_text:
IMPORTS
       MODULE-COMPLIANCE, NOTIFICATION-GROUP, OBJECT-GROUP
           FROM SNMPv2-CONF
       snmpModules, MODULE-IDENTITY, NOTIFICATION-TYPE, Counter32,
           Integer32, Unsigned32, OBJECT-TYPE, IpAddress
           FROM SNMPv2-SMI
correct_text:
IMPORTS
